column4: Is this an ubuntu livecd ? http://www.ubuntu.com/getubuntu/download
so booting from the livecd i can sudo apt-get install ms-sys and then run ms-sys -m/dev/sda to fix Grub Error 17 (i deleted my ubuntu partition and now it wont boot)
by the way, im using mIRC on windows (xchat on linux) and apparently i have to pay for mIRC after 30 days...is there a free irc client for windows ?
